original_text: and each one struck down his opponent. At that, the Arameans fled, with the Israelites in pursuit. But Ben-Hadad king of Aram escaped on horseback with some of his horsemen.
korean_text: 각각 적군을 쳐죽이매 아람 사람이 도망하는지라 이스라엘이 쫓으니 아람 왕 벤하닷이 말을 타고 마병과 더불어 도망하여 피하니라

sentences.original_text: each one struck down his opponent
But Ben-Hadad king of Aram escaped
on horseback with some of his horsemen
